Articles.Content:
Build a craft powered entirely by docking ports.

 

You may use hinges and wheels and control surfaces that are not docking ports, but all power should come from rotating the alignment of the docking ports. Can you build a rover? Can you build a plane? Can you build a boat? Can you climb a mountain?
You'll need to outlaw Zompi drives for this one...

18 hours ago, fourfa said:

You'll need to outlaw Zompi drives for this one...

Yeah I was thinking rotating the alignment. Not docking port Kraken. That's even more of an abomination than I want.
